measure.name: residential_hot_water_heater_heat_pump
measure.display_name: Set Residential Heat Pump Water Heater
measure.description: This measure adds a new residential heat pump water heater to the model based on user inputs. If there is already an existing residential water heater in the model, it is replaced. For multifamily buildings, the water heater can be set for all units of the building. See https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-BuildStock#workflows for supported workflows using this measure.
measure.modeler_description: The measure will create a new instance of the OS:WaterHeater:HeatPump:WrappedCondenser object representing a heat pump water heater and EMS code for the controls. The water heater will be placed on the plant loop 'Domestic Hot Water Loop'. If this loop already exists, any water heater on that loop will be removed and replaced with a water heater consistent with this measure. If it doesn't exist, it will be created.

argument.name: storage_tank_volume
argument.description: Nominal volume of the of the water heater tank.

argument.name: location
argument.description: The space type for the location. 'auto' will automatically choose a space type based on the space types found in the model.

argument.name: element_capacity
argument.description: The capacity of the backup electric resistance elements in the tank.

argument.name: min_temp
argument.description: The minimum ambient air temperature at which the heat pump compressor will operate.

argument.name: max_temp
argument.description: The maximum ambient air temperature at which the heat pump compressor will operate.

argument.name: cap
argument.description: The input power of the HPWH compressor at rated conditions.

argument.name: cop
argument.description: The coefficient of performance of the HPWH compressor at rated conditions.

argument.name: shr
argument.description: The sensible heat ratio of the HPWH's evaporator at rated conditions. This is the net SHR of the evaporator and includes the effects of fan heat.

argument.name: airflow_rate
argument.description: Air flow rate of the HPWH.

argument.name: fan_power
argument.description: Fan power (in W) per delivered airflow rate (in cfm).

argument.name: parasitics
argument.description: Parasitic electricity consumption of the HPWH.

argument.name: tank_ua
argument.description: The overall UA of the tank.

argument.name: int_factor
argument.description: Specifies how much the HPWH space conditioning impact interacts with the building's HVAC equipment. This can be used to account for situations such as when a HPWH is in a closet and only a portion of the HPWH's space cooling affects the HVAC system.

argument.name: temp_depress
argument.description: The reduction in ambient air temperature in the space where the water heater is located. This variable can be used to simulate the impact the HPWH has on its own performance when installing in a confined space suc as a utility closet.
